Command.Name: 列表页面
Command.Description: 这个命令会直接返回到客户端，无需后继命令

Action.Command: <IndexPageActionCommand xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" ContentType="text/html"> <Page SettingType="IndexPage"> <ToolBar Tag="div" ID="toolbar" Class="toolbar-panel" PageID="P01105"> <Buttons> <UIButton ID="btn-search" Class="easyui-linkbutton" Options="iconCls:'icon-search'" Title="检索" ActionValue="2" Action="showActDlg('检索','/Page/P01105/Search',400,300)" /> <UIButton ID="btn-detail" Class="easyui-linkbutton toolradio" Options="iconCls:'icon-add'" Title="查看" ActionValue="4" Action="showActDlg_DGItemActDlg('datagrid','查看','/Page/P01105/Detail',400,300)" /> <UIButton ID="btn-create" Class="easyui-linkbutton" Options="iconCls:'icon-add'" Title="新增" ActionValue="8" Action="showActDlg('新增','/Page/P01105/Create',400,300)" /> <UIButton ID="btn-edit" Class="easyui-linkbutton toolradio" Options="iconCls:'icon-edit'" Title="修改" ActionValue="16" Action="showActDlg_DGItemActDlg('datagrid','修改','/Page/P01105/Edit',400,300)" /> <UIButton ID="btn-delete" Class="easyui-linkbutton toolmultiple" Options="iconCls:'icon-cancel'" Title="删除" ActionValue="32" Action="showActDlg_DGItemsConfirm('datagrid','删除','确认删除选择项？','/Page/P01105/Delete',400,300)" /> <UIButton ID="btn-import" Class="easyui-linkbutton" Options="iconCls:'icon-import'" Title="导入" ActionValue="64" Action="showActDlg('导入','/Page/P01105/Import',400,300)" /> <UIButton ID="btn-export" Class="easyui-linkbutton" Options="iconCls:'icon-export'" Title="导出" ActionValue="128" Action="showActDlg('导出','/Page/P01105/Export',400,300)" /> </Buttons> </ToolBar> <DataGrid Tag="table" ID="datagrid" Class="easyui-datagrid" Options="fitColumns:true,fit:true,pagination: true,rownumbers: true,nowrap: true,striped: true,collapsible: false,resizable:true,onClickRow:oncheckstate,onSelect:oncheckstate,onCheck:oncheckstate,onCheckAll:oncheckstate,onUncheckAll:oncheckstate,onUncheck:oncheckstate,onUnselect:oncheckstate,singleSelect:true" Key="ExpenditureID"> <Column Title="流水号" FieldName="ExpenditureID" IsCheckBox="true" /> <Column Title="付款日期" FieldName="ExpenditureDate" /> <Column Title="付款类型" FieldName="PaymentID" /> <Column Title="付款金额" FieldName="ExpenditureMoney" /> <Column Title="备注" FieldName="Remark" /> </DataGrid> </Page> </IndexPageActionCommand>

Action.Name: Search
Action.Title: 检索

Command.Name: 检索页面
Command.Description: 这个命令会直接返回到客户端，无需后继命令

Action.Command:
<EditDialogActionCommand xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" ContentType="text/html"> <Page SettingType="EditDialog"> <Form ID="dataform" Class="form-dialog" EditPanelClass="edit-panel-w2"> <TableLayout /> <Fields> <Field Title="付款日期" FieldType="DateBox"> <DateBox Tag="input" Name="ExpenditureStartDate" Class="easyui-datebox edit-input" Binding="ExpenditureStartDate" IsReadOnly="true" IsRequired="false" /> </Field> <Field Title="至" FieldType="DateBox"> <DateBox Tag="input" Name="ExpenditureEndDate" Class="easyui-datebox edit-input" Binding="ExpenditureEndDate" IsReadOnly="true" IsRequired="false" Length="50" /> </Field> <Field Title="付款金额" FieldType="NumberBox"> <NumericBox Tag="input" Name="ExpenditureStartMoney" Class="easyui-numberbox edit-input" Binding="ExpenditureStartMoney" IsRequired="false" /> </Field> <Field Title="至" FieldType="NumberBox"> <NumericBox Tag="input" Name="ExpenditureEndMoney" Class="easyui-numberbox edit-input" Binding="ExpenditureEndMoney" IsRequired="false" Length="500" /> </Field> <Field Title="付款公司" FieldType="ComboBox"> <ComboBox Tag="input" Name="CompanyID" Class="easyui-combobox edit-input" Binding="CompanyID" IsReadOnly="true" IsRequired="false" Length="6" DisplayMember="Name" ValueMember="CompanyID" DataUrl="/Share/Query?name=GetComName" IsAutoHeight="false" OnSelect="function(rec){
var url='/Share/Query?name=GetBankByCompanyID&CompanyID='+rec.CompanyID;
$('#BankID').combobox({url:url});
}" /> </Field> <Field Title="付款银行" FieldType="ComboBox"> <ComboBox Tag="select" ID="BankID" Name="BankID" Class="easyui-combobox edit-input" Binding="BankID" IsReadOnly="true" IsRequired="false" DisplayMember="BankName" ValueMember="BankName" OnSelect="function(rec){
var url='/Share/Query?name=GetAccountByBankID&BankID='+rec.ID;
$('#Account').combobox({url:url});
}" /> </Field> <Field Title="银行账号" FieldType="ComboBox"> <ComboBox Tag="select" ID="Account" Name="Account" Class="easyui-combobox edit-input" Binding="Account" IsReadOnly="true" IsRequired="false" Length="20" DisplayMember="Account" ValueMember="Account" /> </Field> <Field Title="付款类型" FieldType="ComboBox"> <ComboBox Tag="input" Name="PaymentID" Class="easyui-combobox edit-input" Binding="PaymentID" IsReadOnly="true" IsRequired="false" DisplayMember="Name" ValueMember="Name" DataUrl="/Share/GetSystemCodes?code=C072" /> </Field> </Fields> <ToolBar Tag="div" ID="toolbar" Class="dialog-button" PageID="P01105"> <Buttons> <UIButton ID="btn-query" Class="easyui-linkbutton edit-button" Options="iconCls:'icon-ok'" Title="确定" ActionValue="2" Action="submitAct_DGReplace('dataform','/Page/P01105/Query','datagrid')" /> <UIButton ID="btn-cancel" Class="easyui-linkbutton edit-button" Options="iconCls:'icon-cancel'" Title="取消" Action="cancel()" /> </Buttons> </ToolBar> </Form> </Page> </EditDialogActionCommand>

Action.Title: Export
Action.Command:
<EditDialogActionCommand xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" ContentType="text/html"> <Page SettingType="EditDialog"> <Form ID="dataform" Class="form-dialog" EditPanelClass="edit-panel-w2"> <TableLayout /> <Fields> <Field Title="付款日期" FieldType="DateBox"> <DateBox Tag="input" Name="ExpenditureStartDate" Class="easyui-datebox edit-input" Binding="ExpenditureStartDate" IsReadOnly="true" IsRequired="false" /> </Field> <Field Title="至" FieldType="DateBox"> <DateBox Tag="input" Name="ExpenditureEndDate" Class="easyui-datebox edit-input" Binding="ExpenditureEndDate" IsReadOnly="true" IsRequired="false" Length="50" /> </Field> <Field Title="付款金额" FieldType="NumberBox"> <NumericBox Tag="input" Name="ExpenditureStartMoney" Class="easyui-numberbox edit-input" Binding="ExpenditureStartMoney" IsRequired="false" /> </Field> <Field Title="至" FieldType="NumberBox"> <NumericBox Tag="input" Name="ExpenditureEndMoney" Class="easyui-numberbox edit-input" Binding="ExpenditureEndMoney" IsRequired="false" Length="500" /> </Field> <Field Title="付款公司" FieldType="ComboBox"> <ComboBox Tag="input" Name="CompanyID" Class="easyui-combobox edit-input" Binding="CompanyID" IsReadOnly="true" IsRequired="false" Length="6" DisplayMember="Name" ValueMember="CompanyID" DataUrl="/Share/Query?name=GetComName" IsAutoHeight="false" OnSelect="function(rec){
var url='/Share/Query?name=GetBankByCompanyID&CompanyID='+rec.CompanyID;
$('#BankID').combobox({url:url});
}" /> </Field> <Field Title="付款银行" FieldType="ComboBox"> <ComboBox Tag="select" ID="BankID" Name="BankID" Class="easyui-combobox edit-input" Binding="BankID" IsReadOnly="true" IsRequired="false" DisplayMember="BankName" ValueMember="BankName" OnSelect="function(rec){
var url='/Share/Query?name=GetAccountByBankID&BankID='+rec.ID;
$('#Account').combobox({url:url});
}" /> </Field> <Field Title="银行账号" FieldType="ComboBox"> <ComboBox Tag="select" ID="Account" Name="Account" Class="easyui-combobox edit-input" Binding="Account" IsReadOnly="true" IsRequired="false" Length="20" DisplayMember="Account" ValueMember="Account" /> </Field> <Field Title="付款类型" FieldType="ComboBox"> <ComboBox Tag="input" Name="PaymentID" Class="easyui-combobox edit-input" Binding="PaymentID" IsReadOnly="true" IsRequired="false" DisplayMember="Name" ValueMember="Name" DataUrl="/Share/GetSystemCodes?code=C072" /> </Field> </Fields> <ToolBar Tag="div" ID="toolbar" Class="dialog-button" PageID="P01105"> <Buttons> <UIButton ID="btn-query" Class="easyui-linkbutton edit-button" Options="iconCls:'icon-ok'" Title="确定" ActionValue="2" Action="downLoad('/Page/P01105/ExportQuery','dataform')" /> <UIButton ID="btn-cancel" Class="easyui-linkbutton edit-button" Options="iconCls:'icon-cancel'" Title="取消" Action="cancel()" /> </Buttons> </ToolBar> </Form> </Page> </EditDialogActionCommand>

Action.Name: ExportQuery
Action.Title: ExportQuery
Action.Command: <QueryCommand xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" NextCommand="导出excel" GroupName="财务管理" TableName="acc_Expenditure" CommandName="ExportQuery"> <Parameter Name="ExpenditureStartDate" Path="Request[ExpenditureStartDate]" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="ExpenditureEndDate" Path="Request[ExpenditureEndDate]" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="CompanyID" Path="Request[CompanyID]" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="BankID" Path="Request[BankID]" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="Account" Path="Request[Account]" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="PaymentID" Path="Request[PaymentID]" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="ExpenditureStartMoney" Path="Request[ExpenditureStartMoney]" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="ExpenditureEndMoney" Path="Request[ExpenditureEndMoney]" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="IsActive" Path="Request[IsActive]" Type="Parameter" /> </QueryCommand>

<ExportToHtmlExcel xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" FileName="付款.xls" ContentType="application/ms-excel" TableStyle="border-collapse:collapse;" ItemsSource="Results[查询付款].Items"> <Field Name="ExpenditureID" Title="付款流水号" HeaderStyle="border:1px solid #8DB2E3" ItemStyle="border:1px #cccccc solid" /> <Field Name="ExpenditureDate" Title="付款日期" HeaderStyle="border:1px solid #8DB2E3" ItemStyle="border:1px #cccccc solid" /> <Field Name="CompanyID" Title="付款公司" HeaderStyle="border:1px solid #8DB2E3" ItemStyle="border:1px #cccccc solid" /> <Field Name="BankID" Title="付款银行" HeaderStyle="border:1px solid #8DB2E3" ItemStyle="border:1px #cccccc solid" /> <Field Name="Account" Title="银行账号" HeaderStyle="border:1px solid #8DB2E3" ItemStyle="border:1px #cccccc solid" /> <Field Name="PaymentName" Title="付款人" HeaderStyle="border:1px solid #8DB2E3" ItemStyle="border:1px #cccccc solid" /> <Field Name="ExpenditureMoney" Title="付款金额" HeaderStyle="border:1px solid #8DB2E3" ItemStyle="border:1px #cccccc solid" /> <Field Name="Remark" Title="备注" HeaderStyle="border:1px solid #8DB2E3" ItemStyle="border:1px #cccccc solid" /> </ExportToHtmlExcel>

Action.Name: Import
Action.Title: 导入
Action.Command: <RazorContentActionCommand xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" ContentType="text/xml" TemplateFile="\acc_Expenditure\Import.cshtml" SettingType="IndexPage" />
